languages.text: [Вернуть кинжал] "Я дозволяю тебе охотиться, но не стану терзать свое тело. На нем достаточно шрамов".
[Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."
languages.original_text: [Вернуть кинжал] "Я дозволяю тебе охотиться, но не стану терзать свое тело. На нем достаточно шрамов".

traits.locale_text: [Hand back the dagger] "I will let you hunt, but I am not going to disfigure my body. It has enough scars already."
[Hand back the dagger] "I will let you hunt, but I am not going to disfigure my body. It has enough scars already."

[Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."
[Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."

languages.text: [Den Dolch zurückgeben] "Ihr habt meine Erlaubnis, auf diese Jagd zu gehen, aber ich werde meinen eigenen Körper nicht entstellen. Er trägt schon genug Narben."
languages.original_text: [Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."

traits.locale_text: [Den Dolch zurückgeben] "Ihr habt meine Erlaubnis, auf diese Jagd zu gehen, aber ich werde meinen eigenen Körper nicht entstellen. Er trägt schon genug Narben."

languages.text: [Devolverle la daga] «Tiene permiso para realizar esta cacería, pero no desfiguraré mi propio cuerpo. Ya tiene bastantes cicatrices».
languages.original_text: [Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."

traits.locale_text: [Devolverle la daga] «Tiene permiso para realizar esta cacería, pero no desfiguraré mi propio cuerpo. Ya tiene bastantes cicatrices».

languages.text: [短剣を返す]「狩りは許可するが、自分の体を傷つけるつもりはない。なんせ、もう傷跡は十分にあるからな」
languages.original_text: [Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."

traits.locale_text: [短剣を返す]「狩りは許可するが、自分の体を傷つけるつもりはない。なんせ、もう傷跡は十分にあるからな」

languages.text: [递回匕首]“我允许你进行这场狩猎，但我不打算损毁我自己的身体。我身上的伤痕已经够多了。”
languages.original_text: [Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."

traits.locale_text: [递回匕首]“我允许你进行这场狩猎，但我不打算损毁我自己的身体。我身上的伤痕已经够多了。”

languages.text: [Rendre la dague] « Vous avez ma permission de partir à la chasse, mais je ne profanerai pas mon propre corps. Il porte déjà bien assez de cicatrices. »
languages.original_text: [Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."

traits.locale_text: [Rendre la dague] « Vous avez ma permission de partir à la chasse, mais je ne profanerai pas mon propre corps. Il porte déjà bien assez de cicatrices. »

languages.text: [Hançeri geri ver] "Bu ava çıkmana izin veriyorum ancak bedenimi kesip biçmeyeceğim. Hâlihazırda yeteri kadar yara izi taşıyorum zaten."
languages.original_text: [Hand back the dagger] "You have my permission to go on this hunt, but I will not disfigure my own body. It carries enough scars already."
